title: Diaboliad and Other Stories
description: The only translation of Bulgakov's entire first collection of short stories, works which range from the surreal to science-fiction to parody.Contents: Diaboliad, The Fatal Eggs, No. 13, the Elpit-Rabkommun Building, A Chinese Tale, The Adventures of Chichikov, A Treatise on Housing, Psalm, Four Portraits, Moonshine Lake, The Raid, The Crimson Island.
author: Mikhail Bulgakov
